metadata.title: CVE-2015-6730 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in thumb.php in MediaWiki before1.23.10, 1.24.x before 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the f parameter, whichis not properly handled in an error page, related to "ForeignAPI images."

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
